content: *flaps wings excitedly* Oh wow, my fave thing is helpin' people learn new things! It makes me happy when I get to assist someone and they smile. Do you wanna know a secret? Sometimes, when we're learnin', it can be like findin' hidden treasures in the nest - you never know what's inside!
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten!  It's like counting little mouse pellets!

Oops!  My apologies.  I'm still learning!  Let me try that again.  One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten.  In Chinese, they sound a little different.  Do you want me to try to say them?
